column1: Faculty of Arts Design and Media

Future Media is a postgraduate MA programme that does what it says:Futureis finding your future and exploiting future developments in the digital marketing and advertising industry.Mediais acquiring your digital media skill-set amongst evolving trends and emerging technologies.The MA Future Media programme combines agency practice with industry insights and academic methods. It's been a proven pathway to success for our graduates since 2012 and is now a winning formula for the 2020s.
FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
